channel.title: First time server developer
channel.description:
Yo guys what up. Anyways im going to develop a server because i feel its time to learn how to code.
Dont expect much from me as im a first time coder and dont really know much even though ive been with RSPS for mabye over 2 years now. Ill just update this thread as i continue my progress through my server (Which im going to start now O.o)
Ive changed for czar to a 517 server so ill be going from there.
Features: Unseen Home 5 Cool Shops Clan Wars Safe Pk Only 1v1 pk Multi Pk Dragons Pk (Dragons attack too) Corperal Beast Jad (Under Construction) Theiving (Still Working on it)
Server Developers:
Me (Verticol) EMPTY EMPTY
BETA TESTERS (Ive opened server on moparscape status page)
karanz321@hotmail.com
Thanks, Verticol
